Name: Fitness workshop
Lokacja: Fitness room in the SOSiR indoor swimming pool building in Nowa Dęba
LongDescription:
New fitness group classes in Nowa Dęba!

The "Barbells Fitness" workshop is addressed to anyone who wants to learn the specifics of weight training or refine exercise technique. This meeting is for you if you like to move and want to develop!

Pump classes are weight training (small/medium), in which we engage all the largest muscle groups. The exercises performed to the rhythm of music are simple, there is no element of complex choreography. You don't have to be afraid of weights, you choose them according to the exercises and your capabilities. This training burns calories, shapes and firms the entire body, strengthens the spine muscles and has a beneficial effect on the skeletal and joint system. You choose the intensity depending on the weight you use ;)

The workshops last 2 hours and consist of 2 parts:
- 1 part devoted to discussing and learning/training exercises that take place during barbell classes
- Part 2 is pure practice, i.e. demonstration classes conducted to appropriately composed music.

The meeting is led by Katarzyna Mocek - qualified fitness instructor and personal trainer.
Wstep: Call us to enroll and get more info +48 661 832 284

LongDescription:
VrGsm Announcement!

We are happy to announce that from Monday to Saturday (June 3-9, 2024) we are accepting registrations for the FC24 tournament!

Don't miss the opportunity to join the exciting competition and prove your skills. Sign up today and be part of this amazing adventure!

Registration: 3-9/06/2024, according to our standard opening hours.

Age: The tournament is open to everyone! For minor participants, consent from a guardian or parent is required.

We will keep you informed about the next stages of the competition depending on your interest. The finale of the exciting competition will take place on June 29, 2024 in front of the community center, where we will all witness the fiercest duels on the large screen of the night cinema!

See you soon!
Name: FC24 tournament
Wstep: Contact us to enroll between 3rd and 9th of June!

Name: Your ad in mCity
Description: If you'd like your ad to appear on the mCity home page, let us know! There are only 3 spots available.
EnglishSprechen: You can post also in English!
Place: mCity Nowa Dęba - top of the main page

Name: Akcja oddawania krwi
Lokacja: Mobilny punkt na parkingu przy Karczmie Jorgula
LongDescription: Zachęcamy do wzięcia udziału w akcji oddawania krwi, ponieważ każda kropla krwi może uratować życie. Oddanie krwi to prosty i bezpieczny proces, który może pomóc w ratowaniu życia innych ludzi. W Polsce, dawcą krwi może zostać prawie każdy, kto spełnia określone wymagania zdrowotne 12. Oddając krew, możesz poczuć się dobrze, wiedząc, że pomagasz innym i przyczyniasz się do ratowania życia.
